mapper.insert: INSERT INTO branch( BRANCH_NO , BRANCH_MANAGER_NAME , BRANCH_MANAGER_PHONE , BRANCH_TEL , BRANCH_REG_DATE, LOCAL_CODE_NO, ZIP_CODE, ADDRESS, DETAIL_ADDRESS, BUSINESS_LICENSE_NO, USAGE_STATUS_CODE, BRANCH_NAME ) VALUES (SEQ_BRANCH_NO.NEXTVAL , #{branchManagerName} , #{branchManagerPhone} , #{branchTel} , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YY/MM/DD'), #{localCodeNo} , #{zipCode}, #{address}, #{detailAdress}, #{businessLicenseNo}, #{branchStatusCodeNo}, #{branchName})
mapper.select: SELECT BRANCH_NO , BRANCH_MANAGER_NAME , BRANCH_MANAGER_PHONE , BRANCH_TEL, BRANCH_REG_DATE, LOCAL_CODE_NO, ZIP_CODE, ADDRESS, DETAIL_ADDRESS, BUSINESS_LICENSE_NO, USAGE_STATUS_CODE, BRANCH_NAME, CODE_FUNCTION('local', LOCAL_CODE_NO) AS LOCAL_CODE_NAME FROM branch WHERE BRANCH_NO = #{value}

SELECT BRANCH_NO , BRANCH_MANAGER_NAME , BRANCH_MANAGER_PHONE , BRANCH_TEL, BRANCH_REG_DATE, LOCAL_CODE_NO, ZIP_CODE, ADDRESS, DETAIL_ADDRESS, BUSINESS_LICENSE_NO, USAGE_STATUS_CODE, BRANCH_NAME, CODE_FUNCTION('local', LOCAL_CODE_NO) AS LOCAL_CODE_NAME FROM branch
BRANCH_NO = #{searchKeyword}
BRANCH_NAME LIKE '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%'
LOCAL_CODE_NO LIKE '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%'
ORDER BY BRANCH_REG_DATE DESC
